pr_title: [ML] update snapshot upgrader bwc test to check for latest min_version 7.11

timeline.message: [ML] update snapshot upgrader bwc test to check for latest min_version 7.11

timeline.author: davidkyle

replies.bodyText: Until the next change to the C++ code that introduces new sections of state that the older versions won't understand.
replies.author: droberts195

replies.bodyText:
assertTrue(snapshot.getMinVersion.after(UPGRADE_FROM_VERSION));


@davidkyle this won't work. Once we do a bwc test from 7.11->7.12 this assertion would fail :/
replies.author: benwtrent

replies.bodyText:
@davidkyle @droberts195 what do you think of making it assertTrue(snapshot.getMinVersion.onOrAfter(Version.V_7_11_0)); ?
This way we at least protect ourselves for the next time that c++ changes.
replies.author: benwtrent

replies.bodyText:
I think the changes are infrequent enough to keep this more precise assertion.
Can you extract a new constant with a more meaningful name instead of using V_7_11_0 please. Something like
final Version CPP_COMPATIBILTIY_VERSION = Version.V_7_11_0
replies.author: davidkyle
